h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Fiery Gourd Location
content: The Fiery Gourd in Black Myth: Wukong can be found in Mindfulness Cliff in the Valley of Ecstasy in The New West. From the Shrine, drop down into the area below and continue through the caves and cliffs.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fiery_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Fiery Gourd', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Fiery Gourd Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Fiery Gourd in Black Myth: Wukong can be found in Mindfulness Cliff in the Valley of Ecstasy in The New West. From the Shrine, drop down into the area below and continue through the caves and cliffs.
